home.title: PAPI Hair DESIGN Studio
home.subtitle: Experience the art of hair design. Your style, our passion.
home.about_us_p1: PAPI Hair Studio is more than just a salon; it's a creative space where art and expertise combine to craft your unique look. We are dedicated to providing an exceptional experience, using premium products and personalized techniques to make your hair dreams a reality.
home.services_subtitle: From precision cuts to vibrant colors, we offer a full range of services to suit your needs.
home.team_subtitle: The talented artists behind the magic.
home.gallery_subtitle: A glimpse into the transformations we create daily.
home.blog_subtitle: Tips, trends, and stories from our stylists.

install_prompt.title: Install our App
install_prompt.description: Get faster access and offline features.
